resources.string: Health Kit Sample Code

Touch Login to complete login and authorization, and then use other buttons to try the related API functions.Note: If the login dialog box is not displayed, change the package name, app ID, and configure the signature file by referring to the developer guide on the official website.
Managing historical fitness and health data
Obtaining real-time data of peripheral sensors (phone sensors and external Bluetooth devices)
Continuously recording the fitness data of the user
Managing single workout sesson or activity
Getting the SensorsController first
Registering and unregistering a listener for step counting
Scanning and saving Bluetooth devices
Searching for available data collectors and deleting Bluetooth devices
Registering and unregistering a listener for heart rate monitoring
Starting or stopping an activity record
Adding or reading an activity record
Registering or unregistering a listener for monitoring the activity record status
Deleting an activity record
Managing setting controller
Set new data type name, Duplicate names are unacceptable, this name must start with package name, and End with a custom name.
Choose which Field to selectï¼Œyou connot add new Field
Use the newly added data type to write or read value.
Managing fitness and health data, including inserting, updating, reading, and deleting data
Feature-based query APIs: Querying the summary data of the current day, as well as the summary data on the local device of the current day
Registering or unregistering a listener for data changes and triggering the listener for testing purposes
Synchronizing fitness and health data between the device and cloud, as well as clearing all data
Starting or stopping automatic recording of total step count by data type
